titleStmt.title: A panegyrick of the most renowned and serene Princess Christina, by the grace of God, Queene of Swedland, Goths and Vandals. / Written originally in French, by the learned pen of Mr. de Harst, and now translated into English by W.L. Gent.
titleStmt.author: De Harst, Mr.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Dring, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the George in Fleet-street, near Cliffords-Inne,

notesStmt.note: The final 5 p. have even numbered rectos.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the George in Fleet-street, near Cliffords-Inne
